member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY
member.summary: Represents a heap summary retrieved with a call to

member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY.cb
member.summary: The size of this data structure, in bytes. Set this member to sizeof(HEAP_SUMMARY).

member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY.cbAllocated
member.summary: The size of the allocated memory.

member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY.cbCommitted
member.summary: The size of the committed memory.

member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY.cbReserved
member.summary: The size of the reserved memory.

member.name: HEAP_SUMMARY.cbMaxReserve
member.summary: The size of the maximum reserved memory.
